verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: canceled] [ARG1: his summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: blaming " tremendous anger and open hostility " by Pyongyang] — a decision North

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Thursday abruptly canceled his summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , [V: blaming] [ARG1: " tremendous anger and open hostility " by Pyongyang] — a decision North
